name: Tiny Snowman Effigy
description:
"The grawl seemed really attached to these."
—Bolla

name: Deldrimor Ring Replica
description:
"OK, so it's not really Deldrimor steel, but it's a good replica."
—Bink

name: Quaggan Friendship Bracelet
description: <c=@flavor>"oOooo Friend?"—Guard Lugung</c>

name: Black Moa Feather
description: <c=@flavor>A striking sample of a black moa's plumage.</c>

name: Wolf Totem
description:
"Wolf watches over you."
—Vigmarr

name: Bear Totem
description:
"Bear watches over us."
—Freygunn

name: Dusty Priory Scroll
description:
"History must be preserved."
—Bink

name: Bent Jotun Crown
description:
"From a once-proud race."
—Lionguard Nadel

name: Seraph Outrider Badge
description:
"Speed is your ally."
—Brian

name: Mortar and Pestle
description: <c=@flavor>For the use of making fine ingredients for potions and salves.</c>

name: Dredge Mining Lantern
description:
"Why do they need lanterns? I thought they liked working in the dark."
—Leika

name: Seraph Outrider Badge
description:
"Speed is your ally."
—Brian

name: Dolyak Blanket
description:
"You need a good blanket to keep your dolyaks happy, because when they get upset no telling what will happen."
—Lyot

name: Steam Sprocket
description:
"This is a part from a steam creature, I've studied it all I could maybe you'll find it more useful."
—Garrius

name: Hand Drawn Charcoal Portrait
description: <c=@flavor>"Bulsa's Son"</c>

name: Order of Whispers Secret Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"The way of codes and shadows."</c>

name: Little Norn Figurine
description: <c=@flavor>This hand-carved figurine bears a crude resemblance to a norn.</c>

name: Dusty Priory Scroll
description:
"History must be preserved."
—Bink

name: Stone Summit Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"Did they really ride dolyaks? Must have been hard work climbing up those beasts."—Leandra</c>

name: Quaggan Friendship Bracelet
description: <c=@flavor>"oOooo Friend?"—Guard Lugung</c>

name: Mini Mighty Oouo
description:
"A mini grawl might worship its mini likeness."
—Sizza

name: Fiendish Grawl Artwork
description:
"Grawl worship the oddest things."
—Fearin

name: Charred Owl Totem
description: <c=@flavor>This object bears Owl's visage and is also slightly singed.</c>

name: Cooking Spoon
description:
"A good cook needs a trusty spoon."
—Hune

name: Dredge Mining Lantern
description:
"Why do they need lanterns? I thought they liked working in the dark."
—Leika

name: Mortar and Pestle
description: <c=@flavor>Grind it twice.</c>

name: Giant Wolf Tooth
description:
"A clean kill."
—Meinolf Njordson

name: Tiny Dredge Tuning Fork
description:
"How do they eat with these things?"
—Surveyor Falki

name: Hunter's Amulet
description:
"Helps your aim."
—Ichtaca

name: Stone Summit Dwarf Badge
description:
"These badges are amazing. There are so many interesting ranks, positions, honors. It was quite a complex military organization."
—Researcher Raekk

name: Mining Lantern
description:
"These help for those really dark caves."
—Adgils

name: Ancient Deldrimor Ring
description:
"Their metal working rivals that of the norn."
—Researcher Raekk

name: Cooking Spoon
description:
"A good cook needs a trusty spoon."
—Hune

name: Charred Owl Totem
description: <c=@flavor>This object bears Owl's visage and is also slightly singed.</c>

name: Hardened Destroyer Core
description:
"This core has cooled, making it too hard to work with."
—Kruppa

name: Hare Totem
description:
"Bunny watches us, too."
—Bjarni

name: Hand Drawn Charcoal Portrait
description: <c=@flavor>"Bulsa's Son"</c>

name: Peg Leg Screw
description:
"One hit quaggan on the head."
—Queldip

name: Jora Totem
description: <c=@flavor>This totem features a relief of the fabled norn hero Jora.</c>

name: Raven Totem
description:
"You must outthink them."
—Sigrytha

name: Dwarven Amulet Relic
description:
"Such a wondrous relic. Dwarven amulets seem to last forever."
—Bink

name: Smashed Dragon Totem
description:
"It's odd to see the grawl worshipping something more powerful than barely shaped rocks."
—Tor the Tall

name: Hardened Destroyer Core
description:
"This core has cooled making it too hard to work with."
—Kruppa

name: Order of Whispers Commendation
description:
"The order thanks you for all your help."
—Agent Kaukiri

name: Ancient Stone Summit Shoulder Spike
description: <c=@flavor>"This artifact is more ornament than armament, but it gives hints of ancient craftsmanship."</c>

name: Crossroads Lionscout Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"Rank: Lionscout"</c>

name: Ancient Jotun Runestone
description:
"I wonder what the jotun used these for..."
—Sheriff Padra

name: Frozen Imp Heart
description:
"Very interesting that the imp's heart seems frozen but still works."
—Suki

name: Spleedoop's Friendship Shell
description:
"Thank you, friend."
—Commander Spleedoop

name: Grawl Tribal Paint
description:
"I wonder why grawl like orange so much."
—Arcanist Aurelio Shiverpaw

name: Frozen Ballista Arrowhead
description:
"That has to hurt."
—Lionscout Alli

name: Mortar and Pestle
description:
"Some think our poisons are potent because of the ingredients, the real trick is how you extract them."
—Ichtaca

name: Ettin Speaking Bone
description:
"He who holds the speaking bone may jabber."
—Bramm

name: Empty Honey Pot
description: <c=@flavor>"Honey is gooood."—Carman Fawntracker</c>

name: Mining Lantern
description:
"These help for those really dark caves."
—Adgils

name: Dredge Manifesto
description:
"I find it fascinating that a blind creature can write."
—Rinceword

name: Goldenlight Hallow Lab Test Results
description:
"Normally only krewe members get to see these, but seeing how you helped generate the more interesting data points you can have them."
—Krewe Leader Seesa

name: Giant Wolf Tooth
description:
"A clean kill."
—Meinolf Njordson

name: Commemorative Beer Stein
description: <c=@flavor>The inscription reads "In Commemoration Of The Krognars Pass Moot."</c>

name: Drake Tooth Necklace
description: <c=@flavor>"They look nicer on a necklace than clamping down on your neck."—Leandra</c>

name: Bent Jotun Crown
description:
"From a once-proud race."
—Lionguard Nadel

name: Priory Explorer's Medal
description:
"Takes courage to come out here. Thank you."
—Priory Explorer Cyara

name: Commander's Ring
description:
"You lead like quaggan now. OOOoooOOooo"
—Commander Spleedoop

name: Order of Whispers Secret Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"The way of codes and shadows."</c>

name: Lionguard Patrol Badge
description:
"Long hours and hard work pays off."
—Haral

name: Dredge Manifesto
description:
"I find it fascinating that a blind creature can write."
—Rinceword

name: Peg Leg Screw
description:
"One hit quaggan on the head."
—Queldip

name: Steam Sprocket
description:
"This is a part from a steam creature. I've studied it all I could. Maybe you'll find it more useful."
—Garrius

name: Dolyak-Herding Bell
description:
"Good for herding dolyaks."
—Maxtar Rapidstep

name: Shiny Grawl Bauble
description:
"Grawl really like shiny things."
—Etta

name: Vigil Scout Medal
description:
"The Vigil recognizes your steadfastness in battle."
—Crusader Rugan

name: Order Of Whispers Secret Code
description:
The only words visible are: "Talk time dark snow."
—Mensorr

name: Mark Of The Claw
description: <c=@flavor>This item is scored with a deep, sharp gash and is off-set by images of water and the sky.</c>

name: Graffiti-covered Stone
description:
"If you want to keep a piece, it's all yours."
—Crusader Brice

name: Grawl Oil Paints
description:
"Not to give them too much credit, but this paint is just as good as some used by the great painters."
—Explorer Erikk

name: Wurm Hunt Souvenir Stein
description: <c=@flavor>"1325 AE"</c>

name: Painted Mokooki Hunter's Pottery
description:
<c=@flavor>"Pictures of great hunts. No more with bad ice brutes around."
—Mokooki</c>

name: Little Norn Figurine
description: <c=@flavor>This hand-carved figurine bears a crude resemblance to a norn.</c>

name: Granite Citadel Defender Ring
description:
"The Priory is in your debt. Thank you."
—Arcanist Vance

name: Lionguard Patrol Badge
description:
"Long hours and hard work pays off."
—Haral

name: Snow Leopard Totem
description:
"May Snow Leopard watch over you."
—Sigarr

name: Pirate Flask
description: <c=@flavor>"Smells like rum and body odor."—Duidda</c>

name: Stone Summit Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"Did they really ride dolyaks? Must have been hard work climbing up those beasts."—Leandra</c>

name: Grawl Tribal Paint
description:
"I wonder why grawl like orange so much."
—Arcanist Aurelio Shiverpaw

name: Symbol Of Balance
description:
"Find balance or fall into discord."
—Guardian Infinite Mind

name: Very Shiny Thing
description:
"Skritt are highly attracted to shiney things. Some postulate it is due to their enhanced subteranean vision."
—Durmand Priory Field Guide to Skritt

name: Priory Granite Citadel History
description:
"The first explorers of this area discovered abnormally powerful ore deposits."
—Arcanist Vance

name: Shiny Bottle Opener
description:
"We didn't need to steal these. We have claws. We took thems because they are so shiny. Cheers!"
—Cakilak'ka

name: Kilroy Stonekin Necklace
description:
"He always owed someone something. This necklace was probably used to pay off a stone summit slaver."
—Priory History Of Kilroy Stonekin

name: Dolyak Blanket
description:
"You need a good blanket to keep your Dolyaks happy, because when they get upset no telling what will happen."
—Lyot

name: Pet Rock
description: <c=@flavor>This used to be a pet for a skritt. A lonely, lonely skritt.</c>

name: Dented Dredge Gear
description: <c=@flavor>"This had to be important for something."—Molesmasher</c>

name: Priory Field Guide to Dredge
description:
<c=@flavor>"Dredge are among the most industrious races of Tyria. Their singular ability to dig is second to none."
—Priory Field Guide to Dredge</c>

name: Priory Field Guide to Munitions
description:
<c=@flavor>"While normally verbose on topics, the Priory is succinct when it comes to the proper use of munitions: Point toward enemy. Stand back."
— Priory Field Guide to Munitions</c>

name: Durmand Priory Field Guide to Skritt
description:
<c=@flavor>"Nothing will try your patience more than skritt."
—Scholar Antal the Patient</c>

name: Snow Leopard Totem
description:
<c=@flavor>"Walk swift in the path of Snow Leopard."
—Toka Axegrinder</c>

name: Hunting Trophy
description:
"This was taken from a large Jotun."
—Neida

name: Priory Field Guide to Dredge
description:
"Dredge are among the most industrious of all the races of Tyria. Their singular ability to dig is second to none."
—Priory Field Guide to Dredge

name: Durmand Priory Field Guide to Skritt
description:
"Nothing will try your patience more than skritt."
—Scholar Antal the Patient

name: Travelen's Lodge Commemorative Spoon
description:
<c=@flavor>"I normally sell these, but you've been such a huge help to us. Thank you."
—Disa</c>

description:

name: Priory Field Guide to Munitions
description:
